name: Horrid Horde Hoard
description:
This build has no audio and has not been properly tested. It has been uploaded solely to ensure I have a submission before the deadline.

This game is a basic tower defense game. Place foundations to block the path that creeps can take to get to your treasure and place towers on the foundations. your treasure is your life, if you run out of treasure, you lose. You must also spend some of this treasure to defend the rest. take care not to leave yourself vulnerable
